snippet: The Obama administration announced that it would change a notorious process to avoid separating families when immigrants apply to become legal permanent residents.
abstract: Editorial praises Obama administration for instituting new process that will allow immigrants to obtain provisional waivers in the United States before they leave to pick up their visas in their home country; asserts that this is a humane policy that will bolster legal immigration and protect families.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration announced that it would change a notorious process to avoid separating families when immigrants apply to become legal permanent residents.
